events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago and want to request a refund because the size was completely wrong and I can't wear it.
The customer's request related to refund due to incorrect sizing will be categorized under the Refund cluster.
Assigning this refund request to agent Susan K. who handles returns and refunds for apparel products.
Hello, this is Susan from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund.
Thank you for your reply. My order number is 123456789. The jacket has never been worn or washed. I just realized the size does not fit after trying it on.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we'll provide, and once received, we will refund the full amount within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for your help. I'll send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
Return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to ship the jacket back, and we will complete the refund as soon as we receive the item.
Just checking in to confirm whether you were able to send the jacket back and if you have received your refund successfully.
Yes, I sent it back last week and received the refund yesterday. Thank you very much for your smooth assistance.
We are glad to hear that your refund was processed successfully. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to collect your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
